devdoc.author: Valentine Orga
devdoc.details: Uses a single loop for efficiency, calldata structs to minimize gas, and robust error handling.

params.sender: The address that initiated the distribution.

params.recipient: The address that received the payment.

distributeFunds((address,uint256)[]).details: Requires that each recipient is a valid address and receives a non-zero amount.      The total distributed amount must match `msg.value`.

params.payments: An array of `Payment` structs containing recipient addresses and corresponding amounts.

devdoc.title: Dispas - A Gas-Efficient LYX Distributor

FundsDistributed(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when LYX is successfully distributed to multiple recipients.

PaymentSent(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a single recipient successfully receives LYX.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows users to split LYX payments among multiple recipients.
